Option.Name: UfCompileArguments
Option.Description: Arguments defined by Universal Foundry to pass to compiles.

Option.Name: GenericCompileArguments
Option.Description: Configurable compile args applied to all compile targets.

Option.Name: UfExtraCookArguments
Option.Description: Arguments defined by Universal Foundry to pass to cooks.

Option.Name: ExtraCookArguments
Option.Description: Configurable cook args applied to all cooks.
